I Howdy friend bulls I found another company LORL that owns 62 of Telesat Telesat stands to receive about 15 the windfall amount that Intelsat does The underlying business is quite healthy Boiled down LORL trades at 6 times earnings and a discount to book value better on a cash flow basis With a market cap of just 700m it already has some upside without any windfall If Intelsat actually receives 20b LORL would receive about 2b effectively 4xing the market capIm going to call LORL investor relations today to make sure Im not missing anything and update
